title: Dark Disco
shortDescription: Whip out the bell-bottoms and put your funky on. This pattern is going to Get Down Tonight.
instructions:
Whip out the bell-bottoms and put your funky on. This pattern is going to Get Down Tonight. This pattern is simply six circles and a background.

The background is just a css color. If you really want to make this pattern disco, then animate the background-color with CSS3 animations. However, that might be distracting to your users.
